High Forces
programme.desc: An A380 airliner is hijacked by gunmen on its maiden flight. Among the passengers is a security expert, whose daughter is one of the captives. Can he save all the passengers and avert the crisis?

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: Featuring 3 urban ghost stories; a famous actor is haunted after he hit a girl while driving; a taxi driver is being drained dry by a ghost; a ghost child wanders a soon-to-be demolished mall.

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: In Zhang Yimou's screen gem that captures the power of cinema, a labour camp escapee seeks a newsreel that captures a one-second glimpse of his daughter. However, he has competition.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries Sophie, who will secure his grandmaster title when he dies. When Man suffers a heart attack, his son must fight Sophie to safeguard the familys gambling business.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Marking the 3rd Eileen Chang adaptation directed by Ann Hui, this film is set in pre-WW2 Hong Kong, where a young girl ends up working for her aunt seducing rich & powerful men.

programme.title: The Movie Emperor
programme.desc: A Hong Kong megastar decides to make a film about rural China to win an award at a film festival. He experiences village life for a farmer's role, but this results in a series of hilarious events.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: An undercover police who infiltrated the triad and a triad mole planted into the police force must work together to survive the cutthroat underworld.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: During the SARS outbreak in 2003, a teenage girl struggle to adjust to life in Taipei after returning from LA, due to her mother's sickness & her younger sister's misdiagnoses with SARS.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: Based on the 1954 martial arts novel, this film details the tragic romance between wild swordsman Zhuo Yi-hang and rival cult assassin Lien Ni-chang, with a dark, erotic and visually stunning twist.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Adapted from a true story, a young girl named Mun undergoes a corneal transplant to correct her blindness, only to find herself gifted not only with sight but also the ability to see ghosts.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: A Hong Kong drama written & directed by Kearen Pang, former talent manager Mei Fung retired to take care of her husband & son, but decides to return to work to find her value in life.

programme.title: Hail The Judge
programme.desc: Stephen Chow stars in this parody on the popular Judge Pao stories, depicting how he helps a rape victim fight the system against corrupt lawyers & officials.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau 3
programme.desc: The latest sequel to the action-comedy FROM VEGAS to MACAU brings Andy Lau & Jacky Cheung back in a power-packed new tale.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a visually impaired factory worker living in an island. After a hurricane cut them off from the outside world, a monster suddenly appears, turning whoever sees it into black shadows.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: First instalment of the new remake of The Heaven Sword and Dragon Saber, adapted from Jin Yong's novel, see Zhang Wu Ji embroiled in a dispute involving two legendary weapons.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu & his buddies. Tang Bo Hu falls in love with a beautiful girl while studying in a monastery & discovers her identity when they uncover a conspiracy.

programme.title: Old Fox
programme.desc: Liao Jie and his father save to buy a home but are too poor. Liao Jie learns survival skills from their landlord Old Fox and ends up hurting him, but his empathy stops him from becoming like Old Fox.

programme.title: Stuntman
programme.desc: A washed-up stunt director is struggling to find his way in the changing film industry. He risks everything to make a comeback, while striving to mend his relationship with his estranged daughter.

programme.title: L Storm
programme.desc: ICAC officer Luk and Inspector Lau are stuck in their investigation for bribery and money laundering cases. Framed for bribery, Luk risks everything to gather evidence to clear his name.

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: The Queen of Female Kingdom falls in love with Monk Tang, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be killed. As the River Spirit appears, the kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: Ah Boys To Men
programme.desc: In this high-grossing Singaporean comedy directed by Jack Neo, a spoiled rich kid is enlisted for National Service and learns alongside his mates the importance of military training.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: Starring Donnie Yen, Nicholas Tse, an inspector discovers that the team of masked thugs who killed his co-workers are led by a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him.

programme.title: Love at First Lie
programme.desc: Ordinary girl Bao meets troubled rich guy Edward. They conspire to ruin his father's remarriage and love blossoms. However, their romance takes an unexpected turn

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Starring Gillian Chung, Henry Prince Mak, Lin You Wei & more, the story follows a Green Snake spirit who gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing & she gradually falls for him.

programme.title: Teletubbies 16
programme.desc: Teletubbies stars iconic characters; Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po. Their world is full of love and laughter as they explore Home Dome and the magical countryside of Teletubbyland through play. Familiar and beloved features from the original series return - The Noo-noo, Tubby Custard, Tubby Toast, Baby Sun, rabbits and the Voice Trumpets - along with some brand new surprises. Look out for th

programme.title: Work It Out Wombats! 18
programme.desc: The Wombats organize the Treeborhood Talent Show. Malik and Zeke create their own Brother Day. Zadie makes noise with her Really Big, Really Loud Noisy Thing. The Wombats build a giant snow globe for Zeke. Super invents a Huggyback rider. Malik perfects a magic trick. The Wombats turn their one bedroom into three.

Season 3 of Australias real-life extreme version of hide and seek returns with an intense twist in the form of a large-scale heist. Nine pairs of ordinary Australians turn into shrewd Fugitives, starting with a robbery thatll see them stealth their way into Ballarat bank to steal up to $1 million dollars, before making their getaway to disappear without a trace. The goal is to make it to the e

Since the dawn of time, there have been tales of monsters that live amongst humanity. Creatures of myth and legend that lurk in the shadows and hunt humans like prey. But are these fantastic beasts merely figments of imagination? Or could they be real?

All pets allowed!! Our fur babies. Our companions. Our extended members of the family. Most people look at us and think we are out of our minds for loving our pets so much. But with Pet Frenzy, you get to understand why our love for them runs so deep. You get to chat to us and see how we live with them day to day. Each episode, a new animal, a new owner, a new challenge, and new relationship to

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE delivers the latest from Japan, Asia, and the rest of the world. While covering wide network of correspondents breaking news and developing stories, offering a perspective from this corner of the globe, a team of trusted anchors ties it all together to give you a picture of what's happening now, and what's ahead.
Robbie Cumming explores South Yorkshire, Lincolnshire and the Midlands.

ABC News' acclaimed series '20/20' has distinguished itself as one of the most esteemed news programs in broadcast journalism. Amid the heated, competitive environment of primetime entertainment, '20/20' has demonstrated its ability to consistently attract a significant segment of the viewing audience by offering viewers more choices and more chances to learn about the world around them.

programme.title: Al Jazeera News Live
programme.desc: Latest news headlines, current events, photos, and exclusive stories from eyewitnesses in Asia, Middle East, and Africa.

programme.title: Trtle 11
programme.desc: Its summer in Muddlemere, a tranquil little town right on Muddle Lake. Wild animals have made themselves at homehere, not in direct contact with humans, but close enough to enjoy the comforts of civilisation. programme.desc: Mino is a lively city cat: cheerful, crafty and very boisterous. In the hope of calming him down, his parents have sent him to a countryside holiday camp for the summer. programme.title: ViuTV News
programme.desc: Get up to speed on critical news and events in Hong Kong and around the rest of the world. We give our viewers insight on the stories that matter the most, ranging from business to breaking news, key events, as well as all the latest sporting action, twice daily.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 29
programme.desc: Journey across the pond to London for heartwarming adventures with beloved British bear Paddington in this CG-animated series, which centers on a younger Paddington as he writes letters to Aunt Lucy celebrating the new things he has discovered through the day's exciting activities.
Robbie Cumming explores South Yorkshire, Lincolnshire and the Midlands.

The Big Bake is a larger-than-life baking competition series with themed episodes. In each episode, three professional baking teams have five hours to design, bake and decorate a grand-scale cake creation based on a particular theme. These bakers need to think big and bold, blowing up their designs to gigantic proportions and thinking outside the (bakery) box. In the end, the most ambitious, eye-p

Jimmy Doherty begins his mission to find and convert a unique vehicle into his dream family camper. With his engineer friend Jimmy De Ville, a search uncovers a rundown 1950s Goddess fire engine, which they bring back to Jimmys farm to begin their epic build on wheels.

After being abducted by Katarina Rostova, Raymond 'Red' Reddington (James Spader) finds himself alone in hostile territory, unsure of who, if anyone, he can trust. Surrounded by old enemies and new allies, Red must stay one step ahead of the Blacklist's most dangerous criminal, who will stop at nothing to unearth the very truth Red wants no one to know about. Best friends on-screen and off, Billy Boyd and Dominic Monaghan, famed for portraying the lovable and mischievous hobbits in The Lord of the Rings trilogy, are embarking on a quest to eat the world. Theyll be travelling the globe to gain new insights into different countries unique culinary cultures, trying local cuisines, and getting up to plenty of shenanigans.

Our cooking teams will take turns each episode to transform an ordinary home into an instant restaurant for one pressure-cooker night. They'll be serving up a three-course menu designed to impress not only their fellow contestants, but also our series judges.
Tommy Walsh, Maxine Dwyer, and Asher Edwards visit viewers homes to solve problems in just 24 hours with their money-saving tips and transformations.

Farmer Wants A Wife returns for a 13th series with five new farmers joining the search for true love. We follow their journeys as each pick five potential partners from thousands of hopefuls, before going through a series of solo and group dates on the farm from a camping trip to a family get together and more. Jimmy Doherty heads to Lincolnshire to visit Fifties and car obsessed couple Pete and Babs, who are converting an iconic US Air Force mail van into a dream vintage 50s camper, to take them Hot Rod racing.
